match: Cape Breton Island (- formerly "Ile Royale", Scottish Gaelic: "Ceap Breatainn" or "Eilean Cheap Bhreatainn", Mikmaq: "Unamakika", simply: "Cape Breton") is an island on the Atlantic coast of North America.
Dominica is an island in the Caribbean Sea, located about halfway between the French islands of Guadeloupe (to the north) and Martinique (to the south).

Cyprus (, "Kypros",;,), officially the Republic of Cyprus (, "Kypriaki Dimokratia",;,), is an island country in the Eastern Mediterranean Sea, east of Greece, south of Turkey, west of Syria, Lebanon, northwest of Israel and north of Egypt.
